properties.name: 1025 Sunset Lake Road
properties.description: Posted by Michaelplummer 1025 Sunset Lake Road Brattleboro VT 05301 Originally a farm with cows, turkeys, hogs. One or two horses at one point. Hay storage in barn until mid-1950\'s. Used now for storage and as a tool room/work room. The property is now a tree farm (since 1975).

properties.name: 129 Richmond Road
properties.description: Posted by Michaelplummer 129 Richmond Road Hinesburg VT

properties.name: 154 Sparrow Farm Road
properties.description: Posted by Michaelplummer 154 Sparrow Farm Road East Montpelier VTThis agricultural out building is located a few feet from the road and across the road from a working farm. The land this agricultural building sits upon was originally part of a much larger farm. The building has three open bays and was used to store agricultural vehicles like balers, tractors, rakes, etc. It represents East Montpelier\'s heritage as a strong dairy farming community.

properties.name: 1614 Route 116 - English Barn
properties.description: Posted by Michaelplummer 1614 VT Route 116 Bristol VTDropped girt. Pegged. Queen post roof trusses. On north side had slate over shake roof - replaced due to leaking (1980). South side had sheet metal roofing before 1976. Attached concrete floor milking parlor and attached surge can cooler.

properties.name: 1614 Route 116 - Horse Barn
properties.description: Posted by Michaelplummer 1516 VT Route 116 Bristol VThorse windows. stanchions.

properties.name: 229 Kibbee
properties.description: Posted by Michaelplummer 229 Kibbee Extension Brookfield VTThe original builder of the barn is believed to be the Kibbee Family. The Kibbees owned one of the large farms in Brookfield in the 19th and early 20th centuries.

properties.name: 33 Kibbee
properties.description: Posted by Michaelplummer 33 Kibbee Road Brookfield VTThe present owners have had the property for about 35 years. The main barn was built in 1805. There are several attached buildings of later dates: a milkhouse, milking barn, shed and silos.

properties.description: Posted by Michaelplummer 999 Stagecoach Road Stowe VT 05672no foundation left used for chickens & storage

properties.name: Blueberry Ledge Farm
properties.description: Posted by Michaelplummer 200 Hale Hollow RD Bridgewater VTWas the only high horses entrance to hay bays in Vermont over Rt. 100A.

properties.name: Cohen Place
properties.description: Posted by Michaelplummer 2832 Sterling Valley Road Morristown VT 05661Formerly a saw mill across the road on Sterling Brook (1950\'s) Cohen place was a dairy until 1940\'s Millkhouse foundation remains

properties.name: Crystal Spring Farm 2
properties.description: Posted by Michaelplummer 2209 Mud City Loop Morristown VT 05661farmed by the same family from 1940-2006. Farm sold to new owner

properties.name: George Berry Farm
properties.description: Posted by Michaelplummer 6 Galand Drive Sheffield VTThis barn included within its walls many functions that other farms might have had as separate buildings; 1903 original barn includes silo, corn crib, chickenhouse, piggery, cows, beef cattle, horses were all stabled overhead on middle floor. Manure went down to the basement lever. Later, mose cows went to stanchions in the basement. 1949, from milk cans to first bulk tank; 1998 milking moved to modern 6-cow milking parlow; 2002 sills replaced; 2008 horses in ground floor cow pens converted to stables

properties.name: Hancock Farm
properties.description: Posted by Michaelplummer Hancock Hill Coventry VTMain barn after a previous barn burned. There is nothing left of the original burned barn. The high drive floor has been taken out to use the area to store sawdust. The high drive henged door is original to the barn. The tie stalls are under a low ceiling because it was originally though that it would help keep the cows warm. However, it was later discovered that the low ceiling kept the area too hot in summer.

properties.description: Posted by Michaelplummer 2518 Stage Road Guilford VTServed as Village forge and blacksmith shop.

properties.name: Valley View Farm
properties.description: Posted by Michaelplummer 3228 Stagecoach Road Morristown VT 056612-story barn. Bottom floor originally for dairy w/ attached sawdust shed English style tying joint gunstocked posts 2 attached sheds 16X40 & 20x46 Re-built in 1995 Wing is 17x48 Currently used to store hay & farm machines etc. Remodeled to include horse stalls currently in use

properties.name: Wheeler House, University of Vermont
properties.description: Posted by Michaelplummer Wheeler House is the home of the Historic Preservation Program at the University of Vermont. UVM is one of the partners in the Vermont Barn Census.
